name: Trap Zone
description:
- 'q/w/a/s/d/f/g' to control the traps

- 'space' to repair wall/go back to terminal

- 'escape' to pause/unpause

Each wave is 2 minutes long and it gets harder wave after wave

After each wave there are no enemies spawning for 20 seconds

While you are repairing the wall you can't use the traps

This game was created in 2 days and was the winning entry for the 48 Secret Jam - September 2017
